verses.verse: And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> with the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H8104>Keep<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> on the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> ye shall pass <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> thee, that thou shalt set thee <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> and <S%H7874>plaster<s%> them with plaster: <S%H7875><s%>

And thou shalt <S%H3789>write<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H853>them<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H8451>law,<s%> when thou art passed <S%H5674>over,<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> <S%H834><s%> thou mayest go <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> thee, a <S%H776>land<s%> that <S%H2100>floweth<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey;<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of thy <S%H1>fathers<s%> hath <S%H1696>promised<s%> thee.

Therefore it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> when ye be gone <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> that ye shall set <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day,<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5858>Ebal,<s%> and thou shalt <S%H7874>plaster<s%> them with <S%H7875>plaster.<s%>

And <S%H8033>there<s%> shalt thou <S%H1129>build<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H68>stones:<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> lift <S%H5130>up<s%> any <S%H1270>iron<s%> tool <S%H5921>upon<s%> them.

Thou shalt <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8003>whole<s%> <S%H68>stones:<s%> and thou shalt <S%H5927>offer<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> <S%H5921>thereon<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy God: <S%H430><s%>
And thou shalt <S%H2076>offer<s%> peace <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> and shalt <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> and <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H3789>write<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H68>stones<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H8451>law<s%> very <S%H874>plainly.<s%> <S%H3190><s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Take <S%H5535>heed,<s%> and <S%H8085>hearken,<s%> O <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> thou art <S%H1961>become<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God.<s%>

Thou shalt therefore <S%H8085>obey<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and his <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> thee this <S%H3117>day.<s%>
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>charged<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

These <S%H428><s%> shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H1630>Gerizim<s%> to <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> when ye are come <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3383>Jordan;<s%> <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> and <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> and <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and Benjamin: <S%H1144><s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> upon <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5858>Ebal<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> <S%H7045>curse;<s%> <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> and <S%H836>Asher,<s%> and <S%H2074>Zebulun,<s%> <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> and <S%H5321>Naphtali.<s%>
And the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall <S%H6030>speak,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with a <S%H7311>loud<s%> <S%H6963>voice,<s%>

Cursed <S%H779><s%> be the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H6213>maketh<s%> any <S%H6459>graven<s%> or molten <S%H4541>image,<s%> an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H2796>craftsman,<s%> and <S%H7760>putteth<s%> it in a <S%H5643>secret<s%> place. And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H6030>answer<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H543>Amen.<s%>
Cursed <S%H779><s%> be he that setteth <S%H7034>light<s%> by his <S%H1>father<s%> or his <S%H517>mother.<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H543>Amen.<s%>
Cursed <S%H779><s%> be he that <S%H5253>removeth<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor's<s%> <S%H1366>landmark.<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H543>Amen.<s%>
Cursed <S%H779><s%> be he that maketh the <S%H5787>blind<s%> to <S%H7686>wander<s%> out of the <S%H1870>way.<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H543>Amen.<s%>

Cursed <S%H779><s%> be he that <S%H5186>perverteth<s%> the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> of the <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> <S%H3490>fatherless,<s%> and <S%H490>widow.<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H543>Amen.<s%>

Cursed <S%H779><s%> be he that <S%H7901>lieth<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H802>wife;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he <S%H1540>uncovereth<s%> his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H3671>skirt.<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H543>Amen.<s%>
Cursed <S%H779><s%> be he that <S%H7901>lieth<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> any <S%H3605>manner<s%> of <S%H929>beast.<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H543>Amen.<s%>

Cursed <S%H779><s%> be he that <S%H7901>lieth<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> his <S%H269>sister,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of his <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of his <S%H517>mother.<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H543>Amen.<s%>
Cursed <S%H779><s%> be he that <S%H7901>lieth<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> his <S%H2859>mother-in-law.<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H543>Amen.<s%>
Cursed <S%H779><s%> be he that <S%H5221>smiteth<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> <S%H5643>secretly.<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H543>Amen.<s%>

Cursed <S%H779><s%> be he that <S%H3947>taketh<s%> <S%H7810>reward<s%> to <S%H5221>slay<s%> an <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H5315>person.<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H543>Amen.<s%>

Cursed <S%H779><s%> be he <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H6965>confirmeth<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H853>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H8451>law<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> them. And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H543>Amen.<s%>
